about_the_game:
Sweet Spring Festival - A simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game themed on the Chinese New Year. Five girls celebrate the New Year with you in different ways. The game has relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girls' photos in the gallery.

- The game has three difficulties

- Press the "F" key to open the black and white image during puzzle

- Players can complete the puzzle by pressing the 'space' key during the game.

- Players can press the AD key, left and right keys or mouse left and right keys to quickly view girl pictures in the gallery

*Puzzle image size is 800x960 px

* Gallery image size is 1088x960 px

highlighted.name: This new year will last a long time
You won't forget this new year
I will make you unforgettable this new year
Don’t go anywhere this New Year

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity or pornographic content
- Contains female masturbation content
- Clear depiction of male/female reproductive organs
- Not suitable for viewing at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
